description: Meaty tomato sauce for lasagne and other pasta dishes.

directions.step: Mince the onions and saute them in oil a large saucepan on medium heat.
Add oregano and let cook for a few minutes.
Add the meat and let it brown, mixing often. Let cook until most of the liquid is evaporated.
Add the wine and reduce once more.
Blend the tomatoes and pour them in with the meat.
Reduce the heat to a simmer, and cook slowly for about 1 hour.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
